duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely operate forklifts in a manufacturing environment with a focus on safety and efficiency.
Utilize industrial forklifts such as Taylor 360, Hyster 360, or other heavy equipment like Skid Steers and Excavators.
Communicate effectively with team members and demonstrate good interpersonal skills.
Maintain an enthusiastic and positive attitude while adhering to safety protocols.
Possess knowledge of lumber manufacturing processes as it relates to forklift operations.
Obtain and maintain a forklift license to operate industrial forklifts.

education_certification.credential: Completion of grade 12, a GED, or relevant experience
